text: Cliffhanger is a 1993 American French Italian action thriller movie directed by Renny Harlin and starring Sylvester Stallone, John Lithgow, Michael Rooker, Janine Turner, Craig Fairbrass, Leon Robinson, Caroline Goodall, Paul Winfield, Ralph Waite. It was distributed by TriStar Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * * * Category:1993 action movies Category:1993 thriller movies Category:1990s action thriller movies Category:American action thriller movies Category:French action movies Category:French thriller movies Category:Italian action movies Category:Italian thriller movies Category:Movies set in Colorado Category:Movies directed by Renny Harlin
title: Cliffhanger (movie)
